description: This file provides authentication-related services for a FastAPI backend, including password hashing, JWT token creation/validation, and user authentication dependencies.

classes.name: User
classes.description: User model class imported from src.models.user

methods.name: str get_password_hash(password: str)
methods.description: Hash a plaintext password using bcrypt via passlib.

methods.name: bool verify_password(plain_password: str, hashed_password: str)
methods.description: Verify a plaintext password against its hashed value.

methods.name: str _create_token( subject: str, *, expires_minutes: int, token_type: str, settings: Optional[Settings] = None, extra_claims: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, )
methods.description: Create a JWT token with the given subject and expiry.

methods.name: str create_access_token(subject: str, *, settings: Optional[Settings] = None, extra_claims: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
str create_refresh_token(subject: str, *, settings: Optional[Settings] = None, extra_claims: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
Tuple[str,str] create_token_pair_for_user(user: User, *, settings: Optional[Settings] = None)
methods.description: Create an access and refresh token pair for a given user.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] decode_token(token: str, *, settings: Optional[Settings] = None)
methods.description: Decode and validate a JWT token, returning the payload if valid.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] get_token_payload(token: str, *, expected_type: Optional[str] = None, settings: Optional[Settings] = None)
methods.description: Decode a token and (optionally) assert its type.

methods.name: User get_current_user( token: str = Depends(oauth2_scheme), db: Session = Depends(get_db), settings: Settings = Depends(get_settings), )
methods.description: FastAPI dependency that resolves the current authenticated user from a bearer token.
